prompts.prompt: A dark, imposing Romanesque court chamber, emphasizing severe architecture and heavy shadows. Center frame, an ornate papal throne sits empty, draped in heavy cloth, waiting for a bizarre occupant. Catfolk clergy members, dressed in 9th-century historical attire, stand rigidly around the perimeter, their faces hidden in shadow, signifying the unnatural trial to come. Dramatic lighting, retro 16-bit pixel art, limited color palette, cinematic wide shot.

Close-up, dramatic portrait of Pope Stephen VI (anthropomorphic catfolk) wearing full, ornate 9th-century papal vestments. His face is contorted with intense, obsessive anger and political malice, illuminated by harsh, dramatic lighting. He stands in a shadowed, opulent Roman palace interior. Highly detailed retro 16-bit pixel art, visible pixels, serious mood, cinematic composition.

Pope Stephen VI (catfolk) stands on a raised platform, dramatically pointing downward with a fervent, maniacal gesture, issuing an unthinkable command. Several terrified catfolk deacons and guards recoil in shock and horror at the order. Heavy shadows and a limited color palette emphasize the dramatic tension. Retro 16-bit pixel art, historical Roman clerical attire, cinematic wide shot.

A grim, nocturnal scene in a freshly disturbed graveyard or crypt entrance. Several catfolk servants struggle to dress a severely decomposed anthropomorphic catfolk corpse in heavy, ornate papal regalia (mitre and pallium). The body is visibly macabre and stiff. Atmospheric, dark lighting highlights the ghastly preparation. Retro 16-bit pixel art, high detail, dramatic and serious mood.

Interior of a grand, dark Roman basilica or court chamber. Center stage, a highly decomposed anthropomorphic catfolk corpse, dressed in full papal robes, sits grotesquely slumped on a high throne. Surrounding the throne are rows of horrified catfolk bishops and clergy, staring in silent disbelief. Dramatic, high-contrast lighting. Extreme detail in the retro 16-bit pixel art style, visible pixels, limited color palette.

A close-up, highly dramatic shot focusing on three catfolk figures. The decomposing corpse of Formosus sits slumped on the throne. Pope Stephen VI (catfolk judge) leans forward aggressively, his face full of malice. A small, terrified catfolk deacon kneels between them, whispering answers for the dead. Intense, dramatic lighting highlights the fear and malice. Retro 16-bit pixel art, cinematic composition, serious mood.

Pope Stephen VI (catfolk) stands triumphantly over the decomposing corpse of Formosus, raising his arms in a gesture of absolute victory and condemnation. The courtroom audience of catfolk clergy looks on in silent, horrified awe. The atmosphere is tense and oppressive. Retro 16-bit pixel art, dark Roman interior, emphasis on dramatic silhouette and limited palette, cinematic wide shot.

A horrific, gruesome scene. The stripped, naked, decomposed catfolk corpse lies on a cold, stone floor. A cruel catfolk executioner, wearing historical guard attire, uses a large knife or cleaver to violently sever three fingers from the corpse's hand. Blood spatters the stone. Dark, gruesome atmosphere. Retro 16-bit pixel art, close-up on the dramatic action, high contrast lighting.

A dark, claustrophobic Roman dungeon cell interior. Pope Stephen VI (anthropomorphic catfolk), stripped of his vestments, is violently seized and strangled by two angry, commoner catfolk figures wearing 9th-century peasant attire. The struggle is desperate and fatal. Extreme dramatic action focus. Retro 16-bit pixel art, visible pixels, limited color palette, cinematic shot.
